Class ChatWebSocketHandler

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
com.sympos2.services.ChatWebSocketHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketHandler
public class ChatWebSocketHandler extends org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
This class manages the chat between two users.
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
KurixDeCuatroCuernos

      public void handleTextMessage(org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession session, org.springframework.web.socket.TextMessage message) throws Exception
      This method handles the text messages in chat.
      Parameters:
      session - WebSocketSession with the current session of an user in chat.
      message - TextMessage with the message that an user publics in chat.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • setUserName

      public void setUserName(org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession session, String userName)
      This method links a UserName to a session object.

      session - WebSocketSession with the session of an user in chat.
      userName - String with the user name to link it to a session.
